definition: to raise the same old topic again/to hark back
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: Then, all of a sudden, some people insisted on bringing the subject up again.
sentences.chinese: 然後，突然之間，一些人又堅持重提舊事。

sentences.english: Don't beat the dead horse. We cleared up that misunderstanding long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不要在重提舊事，很久之前我們就澄清那誤會了。
